tool_description: Meme Generator with support of adding captions and text directly on images to over 1.8k meme templates in 10+ fonts (works in multiple languages).
name: Meme Generator and Template Database
title: Meme Generator and Template Database

api_list.name: /search
api_list.description: Returns meme templates that contain a specific string. **searchString is case sensitive**

api_list.name: /fonts
api_list.description:
Any of the fonts can be used  in any text box or caption.
Some fonts are language specific:
- Chinese -> zcool-wenyi
- Japanese -> takaopmincho
-  Korean -> gugi
- Hindi -> poppins
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://meme-generator-and-template-database.p.rapidapi.com/fonts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meme-generator-and-template-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /templates
api_list.description: Returns all of the currently supported templates and the number of text boxes that a particular template can support. For how to use this response go to **/template/:image**.
